channel.title: CVE Feed for makeplane -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for makeplane -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47830|2024-10-11T15:02:13.439Z -- makeplane -- plane
item.description: Plane is an open-source project management tool. Plane uses the ** wildcard support to retrieve the image from any hostname as in /web/next.config.js. This may permit an attacker to induce the server side into performing requests to unintended locations. This vulnerability is fixed in 0.23.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-47830|2024-10-11T14:55:36.961Z -- makeplane -- plane
item.description: Plane is an open-source project management tool. Plane uses the ** wildcard support to retrieve the image from any hostname as in /web/next.config.js. This may permit an attacker to induce the server side into performing requests to unintended locations. This vulnerability is fixed in 0.23.0.
